name: Thunder Stock Cars 2
description:
Experience the thrills of American stock car racing on your iOS device with Thunder Stock Cars 2. Compete in action-packed races in one of two different classes of stock cars and see if you have what it takes to become a champion.

FEATURES
- Career mode: begin as a rookie in street stock class and make your way up to the best teams in major league;
- Different difficulty levels: adjustable AI difficulty to suit anyone from recreational gamer to alien racer.
- 5 Different unique race tracks.
